abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33107614, pmid33090883, pmid33090891, pmid33103939, pmid33037946, pmid32997812, pmid33104057, pmid33037400, pmid33025503, pmid33113309
